song.title: Tis so Sweet to Trust in Jesus
song.lyrics:
[1] .G C G Tis so sweet to trust in Jesus . C D And to take him at His word .G C G Just to rest upon His promise . C Dsus D G And to know, "Thus saith the Lord."
[c] .G C D Jesus, Jesus, how I trust him .G C D How I've proved him o'er and o'er .G C G Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus . C D G O for grace to trust Him more --- [2] .G C G O how sweet to trust in Jesus . C D Just to trust his cleansing blood .G C G And in simple faith to plunge me . C Dsus D G Beneath the healing, cleansing flood
[3] .G C G Yes, 'tis sweet to trust in Jesus . C D Just from sin and self to cease .G C G Just from Jesus simply taking . C Dsus D G Life and rest, and joy and peace
[4] .G C G I'm so glad I learned to trust thee . C D Precious Jesus, Savior, friend .G C G And I know that thou art with me . C Dsus D G Wilt be with me to the end
